topics.body:
Apparently people, Men's Rights Activists to be specific, got mad at Mad Max fury road. Mainly over the character of Furiosa. They called it "feminist propaganda", cause she's  as tough as Max.

This amuses me to no end.

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555808266368726ce0902400#post_555808266368726ce0902400
Would that work for mlp too? Do we take up more of the audience than little girls?
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55580cbe6368726308c50800#post_55580cbe6368726308c50800
After stuff like Femthor, I can understand while they're coming from. (Doesn't mean that they're right on this particular case though.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55580c56636872684d0f0300#post_55580c56636872684d0f0300
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555809856368726ce0d12600#post_555809856368726ce0d12600
[bq="uc9"]"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555808266368726ce0902400#post_555808266368726ce0902400
[bq="HJSDGCE"]!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/774/659/42a.png![/bq]
It's kind of funny actually how much little kids play online 18+ video games; I mean it's to the point we have lego Halo characters and that.[/bq]
Same could be said for Pokemon games.
I guess it's due to this mentality of kids having a desire to do what the "grown ups" do. And adults wanting to "relive their childhoods".[/bq]
I think it's actually that Nintendo happens to make way better games, that just happen to look like they're made for kids
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

I will give femthor this though. The plotline about her alter ego actually sounds interesting.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55580cbe6368726308c50800#post_55580cbe6368726308c50800
Protip Molly. If they go by _____ Rights Activist they're probably assholes. Anyone who thinks we should isolate ourselves based on something as superficial as gender, race, or sexuality is douchebag.

Heh. Yeah. Mad Max. Hurting masculinity. That's a good one.

topics.body:
There was a Pinoy made movie caled 'Agent X44' that's basically a comedic parody of James Bond films. Vhong Navarro played the protagonist.

Then I realised:
James Bond = Secret agent man
Johnny English = Secret aging man
Agent X44 = Secret Asian man

Also, I recommend watching the film if you get a chance.
